blog.name: angry-depressed-student
blog.title: Klaus Hargreeves protection squad
blog.description: Danny, he/him, many fandoms, can't draw to save my life but I do it anyway, my inbox is always open if anybody ever wants someone to talk to, current obsession is ghost/Tobias forge, I get more depressed with every passing day so if I post some weird shit don't be alarmed

summary: Miles Morales is such a legend. Props to him. First of all, he's like 13, so that's a tough time to live through anyway. Not...
body:
Miles Morales is such a legend. Props to him. First of all, he’s like 13, so that’s a tough time to live through anyway. Not only that, but he’s switching schools and so he’s going to have to figure out his new life without any friends. He also seems to not be able to communicate well with his dad, and we see this in the car ride over to his new school. Miles feels like his dad has too many expectations for him, and we know that his dad also doesn’t approve of Miles’ stress outlet. We can also assume that he has some sort of anxiety, given from the scene where he’s running through the halls. He thinks everyone knows what happened and what he’s thinking. Later on in the movie, he watched someone die first hand. He watched someone get straight up murdered, and he didn’t even have time to process that because immediately afterwards he gets caught and is chased through the city. This poor kid just found out about these new powers that he has no way of controlling and he doesn’t even have anyone to talk to anymore. As if life isn’t stressful enough, Miles also has to worry about helping to destroy the collider and get the other spider people home, even though he knows that they aren’t counting on him. He also finds out that his beloved uncle was actually the one trying to kill him, and then watches him die. Not only is he struggling with all that, he can’t even talk to his dad about it all because his dad hates spider man, the thing that he became. He finally does take his leap of faith and help shut down the collider but he did so mostly by himself. He had to say goodbye to the only people he could relate to and take on kingpin himself. He did this while hiding everything from his family, and he now has no one to talk to really.

Tl;dr: Miles Morales is the strongest kid I know and I’m so glad that kids can look up to him and know that they aren’t alone

i know the hood is gwens thing
summary: A Spider-sona, because it seemed necessary after watching Into the Spider-verse. She does the Batwoman thing of wearing a wig on...
body: A Spider-sona, because it seemed necessary after watching Into the Spider-verse. She does the Batwoman thing of wearing a wig on top of her mask, and her extra ability is leaving behind an afterimage/clone, because some spiders bundle up their silks to make fake spiders to hide from flying predators.

reblog.comment: A Spider-sona, because it seemed necessary after watching Into the Spider-verse. summary:
Even friendly neighborhood parasites need lunch breaks.
Also sweatpants because it really is a look.
Also also! He has enchanted...
body:
Even friendly neighborhood parasites need lunch breaks.

Also sweatpants because it really is a look.

Also also! He has enchanted ear plugs when going around the city because all the noises really hurt with his super hearing. I’m way too attached to this character.

title: Best of Tumblr 2018
body:
Since that Best of Tumblr generator from Studiomoh site isn’t working, I decided to make my Best of Tumblr in a manual way with the help of the site called Tumblr Top.  

https://matthewbilyeu.com/tumblr-top/

So now we see that the top posts which makes it into the Best of Tumblr 2018. Mind you, I file them chronologically like Studiomoh does.

Warning! This is a long post! 

DECEMBER 2018 

http://marvelperil.tumblr.com/post/180720551410/doctor-strange-is-captured-by-dormammu 

NOVEMBER 2018

blog.description: I'm a 18 year old male Filipino with ADHD and a survivor of the #YouTubeDOWN catastrophe of October 16 (US time) /17 (Philippine Time), 2018 and welcome to my trashcan and ship port. I'm the captain of the S.S Starco and my fucking ship is finally sailing.
